summary: This mod will add a beautiful butterfly as your follower who has a ablity to transform into butterfly fairy on your wish.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nO5bsTYaPwA/ToL5YUL_qHI/AAAAAAAAAGI/xyB_90fH4is/s1600/Green+butterfly+wallpaper1.jpg[/img]

[img]http://images2.layoutsparks.com/1/233231/butterfly-fairy-lavender-pretty.jpg[/img]

*******************
Butterfly fairy
*******************
A little girl, Annabelle, lives with her evil aunt, and to get away she sneaks into the orchard at the back of her garden and plays with the butterflies.
 
One day she sees a butterfly actually transform into a real fairy, and she asks the little thing to make her a fairy, too, so she can escape her horrible life with her aunt. 

The fairy, scared her people will punish her for revealing her true identity to a humnan, complies - but she makes Annabelle promise never to reveal her human identity, and she can only be a fairy in the boundaries off the apple trees.

The fairy\'s name is Lorenza, and she is disguised as a Painted Lady butterfly. In her fairy form she has speckled wings, with gold, yellow, ocher and brown shades, and her skin is a shimmering bronze. She has bright blue eyes.

So, Annabelle is transformed into a Common green butterfly fairy by Lorenze, in order for her to blend in inconspicuously, and Lorenza then insists Annabelle changes her name into something less human. They eventually settle on Cerulea, to match Annabelle\'s new green wings.

The newly named Cerulea learns everything from Lorenza, how to use her wings, how to talk and act, and, once she discovers how natural she is as a fairy, Cerulea insists she meet everyone.Lorenza told her to use her fairy power to help someone who is brave and kindhearted.And

always willing to help others. So she is hear to help you ofcourse if you are brave and kindhearted.

===============
Description
===============
This mod will add a beautiful butterfly as your follower who has a ablity to transform into butterfly fairy on your wish.

she will automatically start to follow you.

she will not take your follower slot so you can always hire a extra follower.

You can ask her to do job for yourself and also share your inventory with her.

You can ask her to remain in butterfly form only

or

remain in butterfly fairy form only.

or

Become Human only in combat.

In human she uses spells to fight.

she is leveled with player.

In butterfly form she tries to fight but only make small damage to enemies. Hey You all Know Butterfly can\'t fight.

============
Changelog
============
Added SEQ file to avoid dialogue bug.

Fixed some issues where textures are not showing up properly
===========================
Added Version 1.1

Added dialogue to dismiss her.Now dismiss her wherever you want.She will stay there until you
call her back.

Added new spell callbutterflyfairy Spell under conjuration section to call her back after dismissel.
she will find you no matter wherever you are and start following you.

fixed bumping issue.

fixed Stealth meter showing  that you are not hidden.



=============
Installation
=============

Put data folder in your skyrim folder

==========
Credits
==========
Bethasda Softworks for making skyrim.

 galy3 for Luba Skywings Mod.

You can download this mod at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11621

I recommend used Luba skywings mod by galy3 to get a same look of butterfly fairy as mine.
=========================================================================================

If You like the mod don\'t forget to endorse.
==================================================================================

Thank You
==========
